sentences.english: How does the lotus fairy throw a banquet?
sentences.chinese: 想知道芙蓉花精是如何设宴的吗？

sentences.english: Objective To determine the main chemical composition of Furong plums in Yongtai, Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定福建永泰芙蓉李中主要化学成分。

sentences.english: From the window of my room, I could see a tall cotton-rose hibiscus.
sentences.chinese: 房间的窗户外面，一株高大的木芙蓉。

sentences.english: Datang Furong Garden is the main water-screen movie night, the well-known.
sentences.chinese: 大唐芙蓉园主要是晚上的水幕电影出名。

sentences.english: Furong District is located in Changsha, the capital city of Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉区位于湖南省省会长沙市。

sentences.english: Deliciously sour hibiscus and blackcurrant support the intense almond amaretto flavour.
sentences.chinese: 美味芙蓉和黑醋栗的，杏仁阿玛丽托味道。

sentences.english: Furong Town is an ancient town with more than 2000 years of history.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉镇是一个具有2000多年历史的古镇。

sentences.english: Hibiscus Town were shrouded in terror.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉镇笼罩在恐怖当中。

sentences.english: Furong Ancient Town Furong Town or Hibiscus Town is located Yongshun County of Western Hunan Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉古镇位于土家和苗族自治区西部的永顺县。

sentences.english: Although the understanding and forgiveness of surau committee chairman Mohd Hasbi Ismail is rare, it is very much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉祈祷室理事会主席的谅解和宽恕，实属难得。

sentences.english: In Grandma's in front of a hibiscus tree, there a Graceful.
sentences.chinese: 在外婆家的门前就有一颗婀娜多姿的芙蓉树。

sentences.english: "Thank you, " said Fleur stiffly. "I am sure zat will be lovely. "
sentences.chinese: “谢谢你，”芙蓉生硬地说，“我相信会很美丽的。”

sentences.english: Persimmon cake, vegetable soup, cold noodles, etc.
sentences.chinese: 柿子饼，芙蓉汤，凉皮什么的。

sentences.english: Chlorite in Furong tin allotment can be divided into two stages of mineralization.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉锡矿田中的绿泥石可分为两个矿化阶段。

sentences.english: " Fleur invited me, "said Krum, eyebrows raised.
sentences.chinese: “是芙蓉邀请我的”克鲁姆扬起眉毛说。

sentences.english: Then sit here and push window will be tabled in a Lotus.
sentences.chinese: 当年这里推窗而坐，便可览芙蓉一片。
